content: complimentary pattern 27 color crochet hat design by bobbi intveld pattern no for use with 202548 woolstok worsted for use with woolstok worsted 27 color crochet hat design by bobbi intveld description this advanced beginner crochet hat uses one 27-color bundle this hat is fun colorful and perfect for those chilly days experience level gauge in single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet repeat pattern 18 sts and 14 rnds = advanced beginner 4 blocked sizes finished measurements 18 5 one circumference 8 height materials yarn hooks 4mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge woolstok worsted bundle size g-6 100% fine highland wool 5g/12yds 1 bundle 27 color colors shown 27 color bundle other tools tapestry needle p 02 blue sky fibers notes the stripe pattern consists of rounds of single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet repeating colors as noted step no 1 hat with no 1305 october sky chain 84 join in the round with no 1309 earth ivy chain 3 double_crochet in each half_double_crochet round 15 to end of round join with slip_stitch with no 1305 october sky single_crochet in each chain to round 1 end of round join with slip_stitch with no 1300 cast iron chain 1 single_crochet in each double_crochet to round 16 end of round join with slip_stitch with no 1308 golden meadow chain 2 half_double_crochet in round 2 each single_crochet to end of round join with slip_stitch with no 1315 red rock chain 2 half_double_crochet in each single_crochet round 17 to end of round join with slip_stitch with no 1311 rusted roof chain 3 double_crochet end 70 single_crochet with no 1322 northern lights chain 2 half_double_crochet in round 8 each single_crochet to end of round join with slip_stitch with no 1301 storm cloud chain 2 * 3
